name: AlinaTalk
_source: s;Alina;This may be premature, but I have a request to make.
s;Simon;Given the situation, I'll do what I can.
s;Alina;This is for once we've... overcome Morrissey.|Whatever that looks like.
s;Alina;I'd like to start a university.|In Verstadt land, if possible.
s;Simon;I'm certainly interested.|Would you need funds?
s;Alina;Absolutely.{w} It's a big ask, I know.
s;Simon;It might be some time, but I'd like to help make that happen.
s;Alina;Thank you.{w} It... means the world.
